main

Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.FileReader

  • public class FileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This file is to read files for the file, this loads in the height and width, the fixed tiles, players and the contents of the main.tile bag, This file also allows the writing of files.

      • readFile

        public static void readFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        This is a method that will iterate throughout the file that is specified through the parameter passed in, it then runs a series of checks which is relavent to the correct piece of data, through the if statements below. Then feeds the information into the classes, if file does not exist a file Not found error is thrown
        Parameters:
        fileName - This is the name/location of the file to read from

      • readSave

        public static void readSave(java.lang.String fileUrl)
